pullrequest.title: Part 2: CompositeData, SpecifyData implementation and tests

content.raw: This specific overload of the function will only be called if `Required<R>::Get<T>() const` is called and `T != R`. If `T == R`, then the overload of `Get<T>() const` on line 403 will be called, so the comment is technically correct. It's just that the comment only applies to the specific overload that's implemented here; it does not apply to the `Get<T>() const` function in general.
content.html: This specific overload of the function will only be called if Required<R>::Get<T>() const is called and T != R. If T == R, then the overload of Get<T>() const on line 403 will be called, so the comment is technically correct. It's just that the comment only applies to the specific overload that's implemented here; it does not apply to the Get<T>() const function in general.
